entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
